model.interfaces

Interface GameBoard

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GameBoardImpl

    public interface GameBoard

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkDevelopment(java.lang.String inputDevCode)
      Checks whether or not the development code given exist (checks the input format as well)
      int checkInputTakeGems(java.lang.String input)
      Checks input of takeGems whether or not it is valid/correct format
      int[] convertRawInputToArray(java.lang.String input)
      Converts raw take input for instance take W O B into a processable format for instance {1,0,1,0,1}.
      CardImpl getDevelopment(java.lang.String inputDevCode)
      Returns a development card given a card's number/code
      int getGold()
      Returns the number of golds in the GameBoard
      void printGameBoard()
      Prints GameBoard with format written in ProjectNotes
      void receiveGemPayment(int[] input, boolean gold)
      Receives array of gems input, and boolean gold to check whether or not the payment includes gold.
      CardImpl takeDevelopment(java.lang.String inputDevCode)
      This method takes a selected card from the GameBoard, removing it from the GameBoard and returns it
      void takeGems(int[] inputGems)
      Subtract boardGems with given inputGems
      void takeGold()
      Calling this method will reduce GameBoard's gold by 1

        Returns the number of golds in the GameBoard

      • takeDevelopment

        CardImpl takeDevelopment(java.lang.String inputDevCode)
        This method takes a selected card from the GameBoard, removing it from the GameBoard and returns it
        Parameters:
        inputDevCode - (Card's no)
        Returns:
        the Card itself

      • receiveGemPayment

        void receiveGemPayment(int[] input,
                       boolean gold)
        Receives array of gems input, and boolean gold to check whether or not the payment includes gold. Adds the input into GameBoard's boardGems, and increments gold if payment includes gold
        Parameters:
        input - array
        gold - (yes/no)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true/false

        Parameters:

      • convertRawInputToArray

        int[] convertRawInputToArray(java.lang.String input)
        Converts raw take input for instance take W O B into a processable format for instance {1,0,1,0,1}. Set as a public method for use in GameEngine
        Parameters:
        input - ex: (W O B)
        Returns:
        it's array form ex: {1,0,1,0,1}

      • checkInputTakeGems

        int checkInputTakeGems(java.lang.String input)
        Checks input of takeGems whether or not it is valid/correct format
        Parameters:
        input -
        Returns:
        error code for error message printed in GameEngine
